snippet: In defiance of church leaders, a group of women attended broadcasts of a meeting open only to male members 12 and older.
abstract: Member of Mormon women's group Ordain Women join men for first time at regional church buildings across the United States to watch live broadcast of male priesthood meeting; women ignore rebukes from church leaders to watch broadcast.
lead_paragraph: In defiance of church leaders, a group of women attended broadcasts of a meeting open only to male members 12 and older.

keywords.value: Mormons (Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints)
keywords.name: subject
